Package store.business.util.product

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.business.util.product.Product
      • store.business.util.product.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Product>, Model<MalformedProductParameterException>
    public class Book
extends Product
implements Model<MalformedProductParameterException>

    The book object

    A book is an object that has:

  • An author
  • A language
  • A number of pages
    • It inherits of the public abstract class Product class

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Raphael Dray
See Also:
Product, CharacterName, Book.LanguageBook

      • Book

        public Book​(java.lang.String title,
            int price,
            long uniqueID,
            int numberLeft,
            java.lang.String image,
            CharacterName author,
            Book.LanguageBook language,
            int numberOfPages)
     throws MalformedProductParameterException
        Initialize the books' attributes
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the book
        price - The price of the book
        uniqueID - The UID of the book (ISBN)
        numberLeft - The number in the stock of this book
        image - The image path of the book
        author - The author of the book
        language - The language of the book
        numberOfPages - The number of pages of the book
        Throws:
        MalformedProductParameterException - In case of the product is malformed
        See Also:
        CharacterName, Book.LanguageBook
